Chatbot.faq_a1: Data architecture describes how data is collected, stored, transformed, distributed, and consumed within an organization. It is the master plan for data management.
Chatbot.faq_q2: What is the difference between Data Warehouse and Data Lake?
Chatbot.faq_a2: A Data Warehouse stores structured and processed data for specific analysis (BI). A Data Lake stores raw data in any format (structured, semi-structured, unstructured) for more flexible exploration and analysis.
Chatbot.faq_q3: Do I need to know programming for this course?
Chatbot.faq_a3: It is not strictly necessary to understand the fundamental concepts. However, basic knowledge of SQL or Python can be helpful for some practical examples.
Chatbot.faq_q4: How can I navigate the modules?
Chatbot.faq_a4: You can use the navigation bar at the top or click on the section titles on the main page to go directly to each module or section.
Chatbot.faq_a5: The interactive exercises and quick quizzes are mainly for self-assessment and practice. They are not part of a formal grade.
